data.name: Igrerea: The Land Above the Stars
data.detailed_description:
Roadmap

Igrerea Progress:

Igrerea is still in it's early stages but has many of the core systems in place already. There is no set release date yet however with your wishlist you can see when Igrerea is getting closer to release. Thank you for visiting and we can't wait to see the adventures the community creates.


Early Beta Access

To learn more and get info about playtests, and have your own work and ideas in the game; join the official SCD discord on the sidebar of this steam page!


About the Game

Description:

Igrerea: The Land Above the Stars, is a VRMMORPG highlighting community and immersion, your adventure takes place in a vast fully interactable 61 x 61 km world with an endless supply of quests, loot, and adventures for you to engage in. Features town-building, physics-based systems, fully interactable naval system, immersive questline, player combat, player trading, physics-based climbing, stabbing, guilds, parties, and so much more. Craft your own adventure by finding your purpose, you could become a hunter, a shipmate, a solider, a trader, or create your own job! There are endless opportunities waiting for you in Igrerea. Gain unforgettable memories to last a lifetime.

Features:

Physics Based Player:

Igrerea uses a fully physical player that responds as closely to your real body as possible to give you a true weight feeling. This body allows you to navigate and use the terrain exactly how you think you can, allowing for more natural movement and actions. This includes sliding down hills, pulling yourself over edges, weighted weapons, using daggers to climb, and more physics to try out yourself.

Naval Sytem:

Is the land a little too dry for your taste? Try going to the harbor and buy yourself a ship to the liking of you and your crew. Maybe a small sloop fit's for you and your fishing ventures. Maybe it's a Man o' war for you and your fleet to charge into battle against sea dwellers and pirates. Initiating sea combat and swinging off from the ropes of your ship to the other, climbing up the ropes of the mast, and releasing those sails with fully interactable ropes. Don't get too confident or you'll join davy jones below. Lift anchor quick and return to port, the more of your crew lifting the quicker. See you at the port.. captain.

Town Building:

The town building system allows you to build wherever there is an open spot in the wilderness. You start with a small land deed for your single house and then have the opportunity with friends to create a town with NPCs. You can also create custom building types such as pubs, guild buildings, farms, and more. With a guild building, you can get quests and level up your guild for better quests in the guild building as well as climb the leaderboard.

Blacksmithing:

Build your own sword to your taste using an anvil, hammer, metal, and a little bit of sweat. Fully modular sword building allows you to make your dream sword to slay your foes.

World Events:

Want a change of pace? Visit an automated region world event or participate in a game-wide world event involving world/game-changing additions.

Diverse Weather:

Igrerea contains a fully integrated weather system allowing for snow coverage, rain, hail, firestorms, crystal rain, and many more weather types to explore in each region.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Equivalent or Greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 Equivalent or Greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Equivalent or Greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 980 / AMD Radeon™ R9 380 Equivalent or Greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
